constipation.name: Constipation
constipation.description: Difficulty in bowel movements or infrequent bowel movements
homeRemedies: Drink warm water with lemon in morning
constipation.whenToSeeDoctor: If constipation persists for more than 3 weeks, severe abdominal pain, or blood in stool

headache.name: Headache
headache.description: Pain in the head or upper neck area
headache.whenToSeeDoctor: Sudden severe headache, headache with fever, vision changes, or persistent headaches

fever.name: Fever
fever.description: Elevated body temperature above normal range
fever.whenToSeeDoctor: Fever above 103°F (39.4°C), persistent fever for more than 3 days, or severe symptoms

nausea.name: Nausea
nausea.description: Feeling of sickness with urge to vomit
nausea.whenToSeeDoctor: Persistent vomiting, signs of dehydration, severe abdominal pain, or blood in vomit

cough.name: Cough
cough.description: Reflex action to clear airways of irritants
cough.whenToSeeDoctor: Cough lasting more than 3 weeks, blood in cough, high fever, or difficulty breathing

stomach-pain.name: Stomach Pain
stomach-pain.description: Discomfort or pain in the abdominal area
stomach-pain.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe pain, persistent pain for more than 24 hours, fever, or signs of appendicitis

diarrhea.name: Diarrhea
diarrhea.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe dehydration, blood in stool, high fever, or diarrhea lasting more than 3 days

fatigue.name: Fatigue
fatigue.description: Extreme tiredness and lack of energy
fatigue.whenToSeeDoctor: Persistent fatigue for more than 2 weeks, accompanied by other symptoms, or interfering with daily life

sore-throat.name: Sore Throat
sore-throat.description: Pain or irritation in the throat
sore-throat.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe pain, difficulty swallowing, high fever, or symptoms lasting more than a week

runny-nose.name: Runny Nose
runny-nose.whenToSeeDoctor: Symptoms lasting more than 10 days, green/yellow discharge, or severe sinus pain

shortness-breath.name: Shortness of Breath
shortness-breath.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe difficulty breathing, chest pain, blue lips/fingernails - SEEK IMMEDIATE MEDICAL ATTENTION

dizziness.name: Dizziness
homeRemedies: Sit or lie down when dizzy
dizziness.whenToSeeDoctor: Frequent episodes, severe dizziness with other symptoms, or dizziness after head injury

heartburn.name: Heartburn
heartburn.description: Burning sensation in chest from acid reflux
heartburn.whenToSeeDoctor: Frequent heartburn, difficulty swallowing, weight loss, or persistent symptoms

insomnia.name: Insomnia
insomnia.whenToSeeDoctor: Chronic insomnia affecting daily life, lasting more than 3 weeks

back-pain.name: Back Pain
back-pain.description: Pain in lower or upper back region
back-pain.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe pain, pain after injury, numbness/tingling, or lasting more than 2 weeks

allergies.name: Allergies
allergies.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe reactions, difficulty breathing, or symptoms affecting quality of life

anxiety.name: Anxiety
anxiety.description: Feelings of worry, nervousness or unease
anxiety.whenToSeeDoctor: Persistent anxiety affecting daily life, panic attacks, or thoughts of self-harm

arthritis.name: Arthritis
arthritis.description: Joint inflammation causing pain and stiffness
arthritis.whenToSeeDoctor: Persistent joint pain, swelling, or stiffness affecting daily activities

asthma.name: Asthma
asthma.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe attacks, symptoms not controlled by medication, or frequent flare-ups

bloating.name: Bloating
bloating.description: Feeling of fullness or swelling in abdomen
bloating.whenToSeeDoctor: Persistent bloating, severe pain, weight loss, or blood in stool

bruises.name: Bruises
bruises.description: Discoloration under skin from broken blood vessels
bruises.whenToSeeDoctor: Frequent unexplained bruising, large bruises, or bruises that don't heal

burns.name: Burns
burns.description: Tissue damage from heat, chemicals or radiation
burns.whenToSeeDoctor: Large burns, burns on face/hands/genitals, chemical/electrical burns, or signs of infection

chickenpox.name: Chickenpox
chickenpox.description: Viral infection causing itchy rash and blisters
chickenpox.whenToSeeDoctor: High fever, infected blisters, difficulty breathing, or severe symptoms

cold-sores.name: Cold Sores
cold-sores.description: Small blisters around mouth caused by herpes virus
cold-sores.whenToSeeDoctor: Frequent outbreaks, severe symptoms, or sores near eyes

common-cold.name: Common Cold
common-cold.description: Viral infection of upper respiratory tract
common-cold.whenToSeeDoctor: High fever, symptoms lasting >10 days, difficulty breathing

conjunctivitis.name: Conjunctivitis (Pink Eye)
conjunctivitis.description: Inflammation or infection of outer eyelid membrane
conjunctivitis.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe pain, vision changes, symptoms worsening, or lasting >2 days

dehydration.name: Dehydration
dehydration.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe dehydration, confusion, no urination >8 hours, or inability to keep fluids down

depression.name: Depression
depression.whenToSeeDoctor: Persistent symptoms, thoughts of self-harm, or interference with daily life

earache.name: Earache
earache.description: Pain in inner, middle or outer ear
earache.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe pain, high fever, hearing loss, or symptoms lasting >2 days

eczema.name: Eczema
eczema.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe symptoms, infected skin, or no improvement with home care

food-poisoning.name: Food Poisoning
homeRemedies: Avoid anti-diarrheals if fever/blood in stool
food-poisoning.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe dehydration, blood in stool, high fever, or symptoms lasting >3 days

gout.name: Gout
gout.description: Form of arthritis from uric acid crystals
gout.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe pain, fever, or first gout attack

hair-loss.name: Hair Loss
hair-loss.description: Excessive shedding or thinning of hair
hair-loss.whenToSeeDoctor: Sudden hair loss, bald patches, or accompanying symptoms

hives.name: Hives
hives.whenToSeeDoctor: Difficulty breathing, swelling of face/throat, or persistent hives

indigestion.name: Indigestion
indigestion.description: Discomfort in upper abdomen during/after eating
indigestion.whenToSeeDoctor: Persistent symptoms, weight loss, or severe pain

influenza.name: Influenza (Flu)
influenza.whenToSeeDoctor: Difficulty breathing, persistent fever, or worsening symptoms

irritable-bowel-syndrome.name: Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS)
irritable-bowel-syndrome.whenToSeeDoctor: New symptoms, weight loss, or blood in stool

kidney-stones.name: Kidney Stones
kidney-stones.description: Hard deposits of minerals in kidneys
kidney-stones.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe pain, fever, inability to urinate, or persistent symptoms

low-blood-pressure.name: Low Blood Pressure (Hypotension)
low-blood-pressure.whenToSeeDoctor: Frequent fainting, shock symptoms, or affecting daily life

menstrual-cramps.name: Menstrual Cramps
menstrual-cramps.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe pain, heavy bleeding, or symptoms interfering with daily life

migraine.name: Migraine
migraine.description: Severe recurring headache often with other symptoms
migraine.whenToSeeDoctor: Sudden severe headache, worsening pattern, or neurological symptoms

muscle-cramps.name: Muscle Cramps
muscle-cramps.whenToSeeDoctor: Frequent cramps, severe pain, or associated with weakness

nasal-congestion.name: Nasal Congestion
nasal-congestion.whenToSeeDoctor: Lasting >10 days, high fever, or severe sinus pain

pink-eye.name: Pink Eye (Conjunctivitis)
pink-eye.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe pain, vision changes, symptoms worsening, or lasting >2 days

poison-ivy.name: Poison Ivy Rash
poison-ivy.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe reaction, face/genital involvement, or signs of infection

sinusitis.name: Sinusitis
sinusitis.whenToSeeDoctor: Symptoms >10 days, high fever, severe pain, or recurrent infections

sunburn.name: Sunburn
sunburn.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe blisters, fever, or covering large area

toothache.name: Toothache
toothache.description: Pain in or around a tooth
toothache.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe pain, swelling, fever, or lasting >1-2 days

urinary-tract-infection.name: Urinary Tract Infection (UTI)
urinary-tract-infection.whenToSeeDoctor: Symptoms present, fever, or back pain (possible kidney infection)

varicose-veins.name: Varicose Veins
varicose-veins.description: Enlarged, twisted veins near skin surface
varicose-veins.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe pain, ulcers, or bleeding veins

yeast-infection.name: Yeast Infection
yeast-infection.whenToSeeDoctor: First occurrence, severe symptoms, or no improvement with treatment

acne.name: Acne
acne.description: Skin condition with pimples and blemishes
acne.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe acne, scarring, or no improvement with OTC treatments

athletes-foot.name: Athlete's Foot
athletes-foot.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe infection, spreading, or no improvement with OTC treatments

bad-breath.name: Bad Breath (Halitosis)
bad-breath.whenToSeeDoctor: Persistent despite good hygiene, or with other symptoms

bed-sores.name: Bed Sores (Pressure Ulcers)
bed-sores.whenToSeeDoctor: Any stage of pressure ulcer for proper treatment

belching.name: Belching (Burping)
belching.description: Release of gas from digestive tract through mouth
belching.whenToSeeDoctor: Persistent/excessive belching with pain, weight loss, or other symptoms

body-odor.name: Body Odor
body-odor.description: Unpleasant smell from bacterial breakdown of sweat
body-odor.whenToSeeDoctor: Sudden change in body odor, or associated with other symptoms

boils.name: Boils
boils.whenToSeeDoctor: Large boil, face location, fever, or spreading redness

brittle-nails.name: Brittle Nails
brittle-nails.description: Nails that easily split or break
brittle-nails.whenToSeeDoctor: Persistent problems despite care, or with other symptoms

calluses.name: Calluses
calluses.whenToSeeDoctor: Painful, infected, or diabetic with foot calluses

canker-sores.name: Canker Sores
canker-sores.whenToSeeDoctor: Large sores, lasting >2 weeks, fever, or difficulty eating/drinking

carpal-tunnel.name: Carpal Tunnel Syndrome
carpal-tunnel.description: Nerve compression in wrist causing hand symptoms
carpal-tunnel.whenToSeeDoctor: Persistent symptoms, weakness, or affecting daily activities

chapped-lips.name: Chapped Lips
chapped-lips.description: Dry, cracked lips from moisture loss
chapped-lips.whenToSeeDoctor: Persistent cracking, bleeding, or signs of infection

cold-hands.name: Cold Hands
cold-hands.whenToSeeDoctor: Persistent symptoms, color changes, or with other concerning symptoms

colic.name: Colic (Infant)
colic.description: Frequent prolonged crying in healthy baby
colic.whenToSeeDoctor: Fever, vomiting, poor weight gain, or concerns about baby's health

corn.name: Corns
corn.whenToSeeDoctor: Painful, infected, or diabetic with foot corns

dandruff.name: Dandruff
dandruff.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe flaking, redness, or no improvement with OTC treatments

dry-eyes.name: Dry Eyes
dry-eyes.whenToSeeDoctor: Persistent symptoms, pain, or vision changes

dry-skin.name: Dry Skin
dry-skin.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe cracking/bleeding, infection signs, or no improvement

earwax.name: Earwax Buildup
earwax.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe pain, hearing loss, or persistent blockage

edema.name: Edema (Swelling)
edema.whenToSeeDoctor: Sudden swelling, shortness of breath, or one-sided swelling

excessive-sweating.name: Excessive Sweating (Hyperhidrosis)
excessive-sweating.whenToSeeDoctor: Affecting daily life, night sweats, or sudden onset

eye-strain.name: Eye Strain
eye-strain.whenToSeeDoctor: Persistent symptoms, pain, or vision changes

flatulence.name: Flatulence (Gas)
flatulence.whenToSeeDoctor: Persistent with pain, weight loss, or other symptoms

flu.name: Influenza (Flu)
flu.whenToSeeDoctor: Difficulty breathing, persistent fever, or worsening symptoms

food-allergies.name: Food Allergies
food-allergies.description: Immune system reaction to specific foods
food-allergies.whenToSeeDoctor: First allergic reaction, severe symptoms, or need for testing

gastritis.name: Gastritis
gastritis.whenToSeeDoctor: Persistent symptoms, vomiting blood, or black stools

gingivitis.name: Gingivitis
gingivitis.whenToSeeDoctor: Persistent symptoms or progression to periodontitis

glaucoma.name: Glaucoma
glaucoma.whenToSeeDoctor: Regular monitoring required, or sudden vision changes

gout1.name: Gout
gout1.description: Form of arthritis from uric acid crystals
gout1.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe pain, fever, or first gout attack

hair-loss1.name: Hair Loss
hair-loss1.description: Excessive shedding or thinning of hair
hair-loss1.whenToSeeDoctor: Sudden hair loss, bald patches, or accompanying symptoms

hangover.name: Hangover
hangover.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe symptoms, confusion, or vomiting blood

heart-palpitations.name: Heart Palpitations
heart-palpitations.description: Awareness of irregular or forceful heartbeat
heart-palpitations.whenToSeeDoctor: Frequent palpitations, chest pain, or fainting

heat-rash.name: Heat Rash (Prickly Heat)
heat-rash.description: Blocked sweat ducts causing skin irritation
heat-rash.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe itching, infection signs, or no improvement

hemorrhoids.name: Hemorrhoids
hemorrhoids.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe pain, persistent bleeding, or prolapsed hemorrhoids

hiccups.name: Hiccups
hiccups.whenToSeeDoctor: Lasting >48 hours, severe discomfort, or interfering with eating/sleeping

high-blood-pressure.name: High Blood Pressure (Hypertension)
high-blood-pressure.description: Elevated force of blood against artery walls
high-blood-pressure.whenToSeeDoctor: Regular monitoring, severe readings, or symptoms

impetigo.name: Impetigo
impetigo.whenToSeeDoctor: Spreading rash, fever, or no improvement

insect-bites.name: Insect Bites
insect-bites.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe reaction, infection signs, or spreading redness

iron-deficiency.name: Iron Deficiency
iron-deficiency.whenToSeeDoctor: Persistent symptoms or abnormal blood work

jock-itch.name: Jock Itch
jock-itch.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe infection, spreading, or no improvement with OTC treatments

lactose-intolerance.name: Lactose Intolerance
lactose-intolerance.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe symptoms or concerns about nutrition

laryngitis.name: Laryngitis
laryngitis.whenToSeeDoctor: Lasting >2 weeks, difficulty breathing, or severe pain

low-blood-sugar.name: Low Blood Sugar (Hypoglycemia)
low-blood-sugar.whenToSeeDoctor: Frequent episodes, unconsciousness, or not diabetic

mouth-ulcers.name: Mouth Ulcers (Canker Sores)
mouth-ulcers.whenToSeeDoctor: Large sores, lasting >2 weeks, fever, or difficulty eating/drinking

nosebleed.name: Nosebleed
nosebleed.whenToSeeDoctor: Lasting >20 minutes, frequent episodes, or heavy bleeding

pink-eye1.name: Pink Eye (Conjunctivitis)
pink-eye1.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe pain, vision changes, symptoms worsening, or lasting >2 days

plantar-fasciitis.name: Plantar Fasciitis
plantar-fasciitis.description: Heel pain from inflamed foot tissue

pneumonia.name: Pneumonia
pneumonia.whenToSeeDoctor: Difficulty breathing, high fever, or worsening symptoms

psoriasis.name: Psoriasis
psoriasis.whenToSeeDoctor: Widespread patches, joint pain, or no improvement

restless-legs.name: Restless Legs Syndrome
restless-legs.description: Urge to move legs with uncomfortable sensations

ringworm.name: Ringworm
ringworm.whenToSeeDoctor: Widespread, no improvement with OTC treatments, or infected

sciatica.name: Sciatica
sciatica.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe pain, weakness, or bowel/bladder changes

seasonal-affective-disorder.name: Seasonal Affective Disorder (SAD)
seasonal-affective-disorder.whenToSeeDoctor: Affecting daily life or with suicidal thoughts

shingles.name: Shingles
shingles.whenToSeeDoctor: Rash near eyes, severe pain, or weakened immune system

sinus-infection.name: Sinus Infection
sinus-infection.whenToSeeDoctor: Symptoms >10 days, high fever, severe pain, or recurrent infections

strep-throat.name: Strep Throat
strep-throat.whenToSeeDoctor: For diagnosis and antibiotics if bacterial

stress.name: Stress
stress.whenToSeeDoctor: Chronic stress affecting health or daily life

stroke.name: Stroke
stroke.description: Brain damage from interrupted blood flow
stroke.whenToSeeDoctor: EMERGENCY - seek immediate help for stroke symptoms

sunburn1.name: Sunburn
sunburn1.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe blisters, fever, or covering large area

swimmers-ear.name: Swimmer's Ear
swimmers-ear.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe pain, fever, or no improvement

tendinitis.name: Tendinitis
tendinitis.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe pain, limited movement, or no improvement

tinnitus.name: Tinnitus
tinnitus.whenToSeeDoctor: Persistent, worsening, or with hearing loss/dizziness

tooth-abscess.name: Tooth Abscess
tooth-abscess.description: Pocket of pus from bacterial infection

ulcerative-colitis.name: Ulcerative Colitis
ulcerative-colitis.whenToSeeDoctor: Flare-ups, severe symptoms, or signs of complications

vertigo.name: Vertigo
vertigo.whenToSeeDoctor: Persistent, severe, or with other neurological symptoms

wheezing.name: Wheezing
wheezing.whenToSeeDoctor: Severe difficulty breathing, first episode, or persistent wheezing

zika-virus.name: Zika Virus
zika-virus.whenToSeeDoctor: Pregnant women exposed or concerning symptoms
